text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically requires the response to advise that Irrevocable Powers of Attorney (POA) must be used for the Drag-Along clause to overcome the mandatory notarial execution requirement for share transfers in a GmbH (GmbHG \u00a715).
